title: The Interview - Official Teaser Trailer (2014) James Franco, Seth Rogen [HD]
description: Subscribe to FilmTrailerZone: http://ow.ly/adpvg Like us on Facebook: http://ow.ly/rduc2 Follow us on Twitter: http://ow.ly/ay0gU The Interview - Official Teaser Trailer (2014) Release Date: December 25, 2014 Genre: Comedy Studio: Columbia Pictures (Sony) Director: Seth Rogen, Evan Goldberg Screenwriter: Dan Sterling Starring: James Franco, Seth Rogen, Lizzy Caplan, Randall Park Plot Summary: In the action-comedy "The Interview," Dave Skylark (James Franco) and his producer Aaron Rapoport (Seth Rogen) run the popular celebrity tabloid TV show 'Skylark Tonight.' When they discover that North Korean leader Kim Jong-un is a fan of the show, they land an interview with him in an attempt to legitimize themselves as journalists. As Dave and Aaron prepare to travel to Pyongyang, their plans change when the CIA recruits them, perhaps the most unlikely candidates, to 'take out' Kim Jong-un. The Interview official trailer courtesy of Sony Pictures.
